document_title: Farsighted eyes: Causes, signs, diagnosis and prevention
subsection_name: mat-vien-thi.json_3_Signs of farsightedness in the eyes
subsection_content:
People with presbyopia may not notice any problems with their vision. But if the eye muscles need to work harder for the patient to see, symptoms of farsightedness will appear in the eyes such as:
Blurred vision, especially near objects; It is more difficult to see at night.; Eye strain (including burning and pain in or around the eyes).; Difficulty reading, squinting when reading; Complications of farsighted eyes; Strabismus; Myopia
subsection_title: mat vien thi.json. Signs of farsightedness in the eyes
subsection_data:
